description: The Helots where Spartans slaves. They were forced to do manual labor while the Spartiates trained.  Yet they were still forced to fight despite having no training and no armor
tooltip: Helot units 20% faster gathering, train 10% faster and cost 15 less wood, 10 less food; but attack .5 seconds slower, 10% less dmg, ranged units are 20% less accurated. They don't wear armor and only 50 health.  They cant promote or recieve upgrades from forge.
